name: Banana Spinach Smoothie with Chicken Skewers

steps.description: In a blender, combine the bananas, whole milk, and spinach. Blend until smooth.
In a bowl, whisk together the eggs and season with a pinch of salt and pepper.
Heat a skillet over medium heat. Add olive oil and pour in the egg mixture to cook scrambled eggs.
While eggs are cooking, cut the chicken breast into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, season chicken with salt, pepper, garlic powder, and lemon juice.
Thread the chicken pieces onto skewers and grill or pan-fry until fully cooked (about 5-7 minutes per side).
Serve the smoothie in glasses and the chicken skewers on the side with scrambled eggs on a plate.
